Class PetClinic

java.lang.Object
PetClinic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PetClinic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class include array which collects persons and their pets and give the new client a card number here implemented all methods (add new client, find, rename client or his pet, delete client from list, view all list)
See Also:
